## BiocSwirl

### BiocSwirl Installation
```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("biocswirl-dev-team/BiocSwirl")
```


### Course Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
load_course('RNAseq')
```

### Take Course

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(swirl)
swirl()
```
